chinese: 振鷺于飛、于彼西雝。我客戾止、亦有斯容。在彼無惡、在此無斁。庶幾夙夜、以永終譽。
english: A flock of egrets is flying,About the marsh there in the west.My visitors came,With an [elegant] carriage like those birds.There, [in their States], not disliked;Here, [in Zhou], never tired of; -They are sure, day and night,To perpetuate their fame.
